content: the forget-me-not top has a boxy fit complemented by a wide boat neck and cute scallop edging inspired by the petals of blue forget-me-not flowers this crochet is wonderful summer project this design is created from the neck down so the length is easily customisable to fit your style sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy this pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
